SELECT A.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, S.* FROM ( SELECT MNG_YEAR ,FUEL_CD ,FUEL_NM FROM ENERGY_USAGEQY_COEF_F WHERE MNG_YEAR = #sMngYear#
AND FUEL_CD LIKE '%' || #sFuelCd# || '%'
AND FUEL_NM LIKE '%' || #sFuelNm# || '%'
ORDER BY FUEL_CD ) S ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #recordCountPerPage# and RNUM > #firstIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) totcnt FROM ENERGY_USAGEQY_COEF_F WHERE MNG_YEAR = #sMngYear#
AND FUEL_CD LIKE '%' || #sFuelCd# || '%'
AND FUEL_NM LIKE '%' || #sFuelNm# || '%'
